hero.Description: I build modern web solutions that combine design, development, and third-party integrations to make your ideas a reality.

aboutMe.heading: I'm passionate about turning ideas into elegant digital solutions, where modern design and performance come together to create inspiring web experiences.
aboutMe.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMe.paragraph2: Dynamic websites and web apps focused on usability, modern design, and performance. I analyze each project to propose practical and effective solutions. I enjoy technical challenges and value quality work, always aiming to deliver real value through technology.

items.title: Landing Pages
items.description: High-converting, fast-loading, responsive landing pages tailored for your campaigns.

items.title: SaaS Websites
items.description: Custom marketing websites for your SaaS product that communicate clearly and convert.

items.title: E-commerce

items.title: UI/UX Design
items.description: Modern interfaces that are not just beautiful but also intuitive and user-friendly.

why.heading: Why work with me?
why.intro: A mix of technical skills and a human approach that ensures great results.

reasons.title: Creative & strategic thinking
reasons.description: I combine design sensibility with problem solving to build purposeful digital products.

reasons.title: Efficient & reliable
reasons.description: I deliver on time and maintain close communication throughout the process.

reasons.title: Collaborative spirit
reasons.description: I enjoy working with people and adapting to each client’s vision and goals.

reasons.title: Innovative approach
reasons.description: I stay ahead of trends, bringing fresh and innovative ideas to each project.

reasons.title: Attention to detail
reasons.description: I focus on the small details that make a big impact on the final result.

reasons.title: User-first mindset
reasons.description: I design with empathy to create experiences that resonate with real people.

questions.q: How long does it take to build my website?
questions.a: The timeline depends on your project’s scope, but a typical website, such as a landing page or small e-commerce site, is completed in 2 to 4 weeks. This includes discovery, design, development, testing, and launch. Complex projects like SaaS platforms may take longer, and I’ll provide a detailed timeline upfront.

questions.q: Can I update my website content after it’s built?
questions.a: Absolutely. I can integrate a user-friendly content management system (CMS) so you can easily edit text, images, and products. For non-CMS sites, I provide a tailored guide or video tutorial to empower you to make updates independently.

questions.q: What kind of support do you offer post-launch?
questions.a: I provide a 30-day support period after launch to ensure everything runs smoothly, addressing any issues promptly. Optional maintenance plans are available for ongoing updates, security monitoring, performance optimization, and feature enhancements.

questions.q: Can you build custom features like e-commerce or booking systems?
questions.a: Yes, I specialize in custom solutions. Whether you need an e-commerce store with payment gateways, a booking system, or a SaaS platform with advanced functionality, I’ll tailor the solution to your needs using modern technologies.

questions.q: Will my website work seamlessly on mobile devices?
questions.a: Every website I build is fully responsive, ensuring a flawless experience across smartphones, tablets, and desktops. I prioritize mobile-first design and test rigorously to guarantee performance and usability on all devices.

questions.q: What do you need from me to start a project?
questions.a: To kick things off, share your business goals, any existing content (e.g., text, logos, images), and examples of websites you admire. If you’re unsure, I’ll guide you through a discovery phase to clarify your vision and create a tailored plan.

Contact.subtitle: Let’s build something that makes a difference.

footer.slogan: Bring code to life. Let it speak for you.

crypto-hub.description: Web application for tracking and analyzing the crypto market. Designed as a personal tool, it allows real-time price viewing, portfolio simulation, trade logging, and trend analysis. Integrates public APIs and stores user-customized information. Built with Vue and Supabase.

subilo.description: SaaS platform for sharing high-quality audio tracks privately. Personal project in development, focused on SEO, user experience, and idea validation. Built with React, Supabase, and Tailwind.

bykalanit.description: Landing page designed for an entrepreneur client. Showcases handmade embroidered products, with responsive design, visual identity, and SEO optimization. Built with next.js, tailwind, and framer motion.

social.description:
Beyond code, I'm passionate about crypto, music, and spaces where creativity meets technology. I enjoy connecting with curious people, makers, digital musicians, or developers eager to create and share.

If you share that energy, let's connect!
